form:
es checks - Run on ES SH - true true true true true true true true true true true true true true true
-
enabled_rules ES Only
| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | table title,actions -24h@h now 1
20 none none false false false true
rules_enabled_count ES Only
| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /servicesNS/-/SplunkEnterpriseSecuritySuite/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | where disabled=0 | eval actions=split(actions, ",") | stats count -24h@h now 1
value block none 0 ["0x53a051","0x53a051"] [0] 1 1 0 1 medium standard absolute rules_enabled after 1 1
unique_saved_searches
index=_internal sourcetype="scheduler" host=s1sh* | stats dc(savedsearch_name) -24h@h now 1
value block none 0 ["0x006d9c","0x006d9c"] [0] progressbar 1 1 0 1 medium standard absolute unique_searches after 1 1
all_rules
| rest splunk_server=s1sh* count=0 /services/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | rename eai:acl.app as app, title as csearch_name, action.correlationsearch.label as csearch_label, action.notable.param.security_domain as security_domain | table csearch_name, csearch_label, app, security_domain, description -24h@h now 1
10 none none false progressbar false false true
dm_check
| `datamodel("Splunk_Audit", "Datamodel_Acceleration")` | `drop_dm_object_name("Datamodel_Acceleration")` | join type=outer last_sid [| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /services/search/jobs reportSearch=summarize* | rename sid as last_sid | fields last_sid,runDuration] | eval "size(MB)"=round(size/1048576,1), "retention(days)"=if(retention==0,"unlimited",round(retention/86400,1)), "complete(%)"=round(complete*100,1), "runDuration(s)"=round(runDuration,1) | sort 100 + datamodel | fieldformat earliest=strftime(earliest, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") | fieldformat latest=strftime(latest, "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S") | fields datamodel,app,cron,retention(days),earliest,latest,is_inprogress,complete(%),size(MB),runDuration(s),last_error -24h@h now 1
20 none none false false false true
if (match(value,"^100.0$"),"#228B22","#FF5733")
dm_performance
index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler component=SavedSplunker ACCELERATE NOT skipped run_time=* | rex field=savedsearch_id "ACCELERATE_(?:[A-F0-9\-]{36}_)?(?<acceleration>.*?)_ACCELERATE" | timechart span=5m max(run_time) AS run_time by acceleration -24h@h now 1
ellipsisNone 0 visible visible visible none linear none linear none 0 inherit line 50 10 area gaps none 0.01 default shiny none 0 0 ellipsisMiddle standard right 2 0 1 medium
apps_installed
| rest /services/apps/local| table label version| dedup label -30m now 1
20 none none false false false true
rt_concurrency_check
index=_internal (host=s1sh1.ops.com OR host=s1sh2.ops.com OR host=s1sh3.ops.com) source=*metrics.log group=search_concurrency "system total" NOT user=* | timechart max(active_realtime_searches) by host -24h@h now 1
ellipsisNone 0 visible visible visible none linear none linear none 0 inherit line 50 10 area gaps none 0.01 default shiny none 0 0 ellipsisMiddle standard right 2 progressbar 0 1 medium
historical_concurrency_check
index=_internal (host=s1sh1.ops.com OR host=s1sh2.ops.com OR host=s1sh3.ops.com) source=*metrics.log group=search_concurrency | timechart max(active_hist_searches) by host 1625637600.000 1625727419.000 1
ellipsisNone 0 visible visible visible none linear none linear none 0 inherit line 50 10 area gaps none 0.01 default shiny none 0 0 ellipsisMiddle standard right 2 progressbar 0 1 medium
skipped_searches_by_sec_sh
index=_internal earliest=-24h status=skipped sourcetype=scheduler | stats count by host app reason | sort - count -24h@h now 1
20 none none false progressbar false false true
if (match(value,"^.*$"),"#FF5733","#228B22")
app_skipped_search_check
apps_list app app
index=_internal earliest=-7d@d latest=now status=skipped sourcetype=scheduler | stats count by app -24h@h now
index=_internal earliest=-7d@d latest=now status=skipped sourcetype=scheduler app=$my_app$ | timechart count by app -24h@h now 1
ellipsisNone 0 visible visible visible none linear none linear none 0 inherit column 50 10 area gaps none 0.01 default shiny none 0 0 ellipsisMiddle standard right 2 progressbar 0 1 medium
cron_job_stats
index=_internal host=s1sh* sourcetype=scheduler result_count | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | stats avg(result_count) min(result_count) max(result_count), sparkline avg(run_time) min(run_time) max(run_time) sum(run_time) values(host) AS hosts count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name, app | join savedsearch_name type=outer [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields title eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time search | rename title AS savedsearch_name eai:acl.app AS App eai:acl.owner AS owner cron_schedule AS cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time AS "Dispatch Earliest Time" dispatch.latest_time AS "Dispatch Latest Time"] | makemv delim="," values(host) | sort - avg(run_time) | eventstats max(cron_schedule) BY cron_schedule | top limit=100 "max(cron_schedule)" -24h@h now 1
ellipsisNone 0 visible visible visible none linear none linear none 0 inherit column 50 10 area gaps none 0.01 default shiny none 0 0 ellipsisMiddle standard right 2 progressbar 0 1 medium
searches_by_cron_jobs
index=_internal host=s1sh* sourcetype=scheduler result_count | stats count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name | join savedsearch_name type=outer [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields title eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time search | rename title AS savedsearch_name cron_schedule AS cron_schedule ] | eval cron_description=case(cron_schedule=="0", "At every minute.", cron_schedule=="*/15 * * * *", "At every 15th minute.", cron_schedule=="*/30 * * * *", "At every 30th minute.", cron_schedule=="*/5 * * * *", "At every 5th minute.", cron_schedule=="0 * * * *", "At minute 0.", cron_schedule=="0 2 * * *", "At 02:00.", cron_schedule=="0 3 * * *", "At 03:00.", cron_schedule=="0 5 * * *", "At 05:00.", cron_schedule=="1 * * * *", "At minute 1.", cron_schedule=="1 0 * * *", "At 00:01.", cron_schedule=="1 1 * * *", "At 01:01.", cron_schedule=="1 3 * * *", "At 03:01.", cron_schedule=="1-56/5 * * * *", "At every 5th minute from 1 through 56.", cron_schedule=="5 * * * *", "At minute 5.", cron_schedule=="10 * * * *", "At minute 10.", cron_schedule=="10 0,4,8,12,16,20 * * *", "At minute 10 past hour 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20.", cron_schedule=="10 3 * * *", "At 03:10.", cron_schedule=="10,25,40,55 * * * *", "At minute 10, 25, 40, and 55.", cron_schedule=="15 * * * *", "At minute 15.", cron_schedule=="15 */4 * * *", "At minute 15 past every 4th hour.", cron_schedule=="15 0,4,8,12,16,20 * * *", "At minute 15 past hour 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20.", cron_schedule=="17 * * * *", "At minute 17.", cron_schedule=="20 * * * *", "At minute 20.", cron_schedule=="20 3 * * *", "At 03:20.", cron_schedule=="25 * * * *", "At minute 25.", cron_schedule=="30 * * * *", "At minute 30.", cron_schedule=="30 0,4,8,12,16,20 * * *", "At minute 30 past hour 0, 4, 8, 12, 16, and 20.", cron_schedule=="30 4 * * *", "At 04:30.", cron_schedule=="33 3 * * *", "At 03:33.", cron_schedule=="35 * * * *", "At minute 35.", cron_schedule=="35 3 * * *", "At 03:35.", cron_schedule=="40 * * * *", "At minute 40.", cron_schedule=="45 * * * *", "At minute 45.", cron_schedule=="50 * * * *", "At minute 50.", cron_schedule=="50 4 * * *", "At 04:50.", cron_schedule=="55 0,6,12,18 * * *", "At minute 55 past hour 0, 6, 12, and 18." )
| stats count by savedsearch_name cron_schedule,cron_description | table savedsearch_name, cron_schedule cron_description | stats list(savedsearch_name) by cron_schedule cron_description | sort cron_schedule -24h@h now 1
10 none none false progressbar false false true
bundle_size
index=_internal host=s1sh* name=bundle_metadata source=*/metrics.log* | eval size_mb=round(((bundle_bytes / 1024) / 1024),2) | timechart minspan=30s avg(size_mb) by bundle_type -24h@h now 1
ellipsisNone 0 visible visible visible none linear none linear none 0 inherit column 50 10 area gaps none 0.01 default shiny none 0 0 ellipsisMiddle standard right 2 0 1 medium
sh_skipped_searches
(earliest=-60m index=_internal host=s1sh* sourcetype=scheduler (status="completed" OR status="skipped")) | stats count(eval(status=="completed" OR status=="skipped")) AS total_executions, count(eval(status=="skipped")) AS skipped_executions by host | eval skip_ratio=((skipped_executions / total_executions) * 100), severity_level=case((skip_ratio == 0),0,(skip_ratio > 0),2), skip_ratio=(round(skip_ratio,2) . "%") | rename host as instance | fields + instance, total_executions, skipped_executions, skip_ratio, severity_level -24h@h now 1
20 none none false progressbar false false true
non_es_apps_searches
index=_internal host=s1sh* sourcetype=scheduler result_count | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | stats avg(result_count) min(result_count) max(result_count), sparkline avg(run_time) min(run_time) max(run_time) sum(run_time) values(host) AS hosts count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name, app | join savedsearch_name type=outer [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields title eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time search | rename title AS savedsearch_name eai:acl.app AS App eai:acl.owner AS Owner cron_schedule AS "Cron Schedule" dispatch.earliest_time AS "Dispatch Earliest Time" dispatch.latest_time AS "Dispatch Latest Time"] | rename savedsearch_name AS "Saved Search Name" search AS "SPL Query" app AS App max(run_time) AS max_run_time | makemv delim="," values(host) | sort - avg(run_time) | search App=dwp* OR App=track* | eval app_run_time_min = round(max_run_time/60,2) | table "Saved Search Name", App, Owner, "Cron Schedule" hosts, execution_count, sparkline, app_run_time_min -24h@h now 1
5 none none false false false true
es_splunk_apps_searches
index=_internal host=s1sh* sourcetype=scheduler result_count | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | stats avg(result_count) min(result_count) max(result_count), sparkline avg(run_time) min(run_time) max(run_time) sum(run_time) values(host) AS hosts count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name, app | join savedsearch_name type=outer [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields title eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time search | rename title AS savedsearch_name eai:acl.app AS App eai:acl.owner AS Owner cron_schedule AS "Cron Schedule" dispatch.earliest_time AS "Dispatch Earliest Time" dispatch.latest_time AS "Dispatch Latest Time"] | rename savedsearch_name AS "Saved Search Name" search AS "SPL Query" app AS App max(run_time) AS max_run_time | makemv delim="," values(host) | sort - avg(run_time) | search App=SA* OR App=Splunk* OR Appl=DA* | eval app_run_time_min = round(max_run_time/60,2) | table "Saved Search Name", App, Owner, "Cron Schedule" hosts, execution_count, sparkline, app_run_time_min -24h@h now 1
5 none none false progressbar false false true
schedule_search_check
index=_internal host=s1sh* sourcetype=scheduler result_count | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | stats avg(result_count) min(result_count) max(result_count), sparkline avg(run_time) min(run_time) max(run_time) sum(run_time) values(host) AS hosts count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name, app | join savedsearch_name type=outer [| rest /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields title eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time search | rename title AS savedsearch_name eai:acl.app AS App eai:acl.owner AS Owner cron_schedule AS "Cron Schedule" dispatch.earliest_time AS "Dispatch Earliest Time" dispatch.latest_time AS "Dispatch Latest Time"]| rename savedsearch_name AS "Saved Search Name" search AS "SPL Query" app AS App | makemv delim="," values(host) | sort - avg(run_time) | table "Saved Search Name", App, Owner, "SPL Query", "Dispatch Earliest Time" "Dispatch Latest Time" "Cron Schedule" hosts, execution_count, sparkline, *(result_count), sum(run_time) *(run_time) -24h@h now 1
5 none none false progressbar false false true
event_types_tags_check
| rest /services/configs/conf-tags splunk_server=local | search malware=enabled | eval equates=split(title, "=") | eval conf_key=mvindex(equates, 0) | eval conf_val=mvindex(equates, 1) | eval conf_key=if(conf_key="eventtype", "eventtypes", conf_key) | fields conf_key, conf_val | map maxsearches=40 search="| rest /services/configs/conf-$$conf_key$$/$$conf_val$$ splunk_server=local | search disabled=0 | fields title, eai:acl.app, search" -24h@h now 1
50 none none false false false true
es_extended_rules ES Only
| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /services/saved/searches | where match('action.correlationsearch.enabled', "1|[Tt]|[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ee]") | rename eai:acl.app as app, title as use_case_rule, action.correlationsearch.label as csearch_label, action.notable.param.security_domain as security_domain eai:acl.perms.write AS permissions | table use_case_rule csearch_label, description app, security_domain, search cron_schedule disabled, permissions updated -24h@h now 1
50 none none false false false true
event_types_per_app_check
| rest /services/saved/eventtypes splunk_server=local | where NOT (like(search,"%index=%") OR like(search,"%index =%")) | table splunk_server title search "eai:acl.app" tags "eai:acl.owner" disabled | rename title as "Name" "eai:acl.app" as app "eai:acl.owner" as owner -24h@h now 1
50 none none false false false true
